name: Eatsimplefoods
slogan: Simple Foods believes good quality, fresh food can help people to become their best version
description:
We are launching a NEW CONCEPT for frozen convenience food and offering 
great tasting pouches where consumers can mix and match individual portions depending on their needs. Choose from protein, base/carbs, veggies & desserts. Health forward, convenient and carefully sourced.

jobs.title: Logistics Coordinator
jobs.description: We are a start up at its early stages and expect to be up & running by the end of April- early May. You will have the opportunity to be the #1 employee of the company and report directly to the Company’s CSO and CEO. If you’d like to kick start your career in Logistics or Customer Operations this is the perfect role for you.
